targets.expr: sum by (statusCode) (rate(gws_app_workspace_requests{metricName="count", type="incoming", statusCode!~"200|302", tenantName=~"$Tenant", namespace="{{ $.Release.Namespace }}"}[1m]))
sum by (statusCode) (rate(gws_app_workspace_requests{metricName="count", type="outgoing", statusCode!~"200|302", tenantName=~"$Tenant", namespace="{{ $.Release.Namespace }}"}[1m]))
sum by (category, statusCode) (rate(gws_app_workspace_requests{metricName="count", type="incoming", statusCode!~"200|302", tenantName=~"$Tenant", namespace="{{ $.Release.Namespace }}"}[1m]))

panels.title: API Error Response Rates by Category

targets.expr: sum by (category, statusCode) (rate(gws_app_workspace_requests{metricName="count", type="outgoing", statusCode!~"200|302", tenantName=~"$Tenant", namespace="{{ $.Release.Namespace }}"}[1m]))

panels.title: Platform Error Response Rates by Category
Average API Request Duration by Category
Average Platform Request Duration by Category
API Event Publication Rates by Category
Incoming Platform Event Rates by Category
API Event Publication Rates by Event Name
Incoming Platform Event Rates by Event Name

targets.expr: sum by (eventDetail) (rate(gws_app_workspace_events{metricName="count", type="incoming", eventName="EventError", category="voice", eventDetail!="", tenantName=~"$Tenant", namespace="{{ $.Release.Namespace }}"}[1m]))

sum by (eventDetail) (rate(gws_app_workspace_events{metricName="count", type="incoming", eventName="EventError", category!="voice", eventDetail!="", tenantName=~"$Tenant", namespace="{{ $.Release.Namespace }}"}[1m]))

sum by (eventName, eventDetail) (rate(gws_app_workspace_events{metricName="count", type="outgoing", category="voice", eventName="CallStateChanged", eventDetail!="", tenantName=~"$Tenant", namespace="{{ $.Release.Namespace }}"}[1m]))
